text.autoconfig.musicdr.title: Music Duration Reducer (Hover over options)
text.autoconfig.musicdr.option.minTime.@: Minimum delay for next song to play (in seconds)
text.autoconfig.musicdr.option.maxTime.@: Maximum delay for next song to play (in seconds)
text.autoconfig.musicdr.option.divide.@T: Choose to divide original delay times
text.autoconfig.musicdr.option.experimen: Change pitch randomly each time a song starts
The chance for a song to change pitch
Minimum key change, Set lower for slower music.
Maximum key change, Set higher for faster music.
